oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bachmann, John, cartographer and engraver
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Panorama of the Seat of War. Bird’s Eye View of Kentucky and Tennessee Showing Cairo and Part of the Southern States
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color birds eye view of landscape cut through with rivers. Includes tables showing distance from Cairo to several locations. Also shows forts and cities.

This map, published in New York the year of the commencement of the Civil War, shows the complicated network of waterways and wilderness that confronted Union soldiers coming into the western theater.

Visualizing the War
